QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: guidedMinimumAltitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Minimum altitude for guided actions altitude slider.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: guidedMaximumAltitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Maximum altitude for guided actions altitude slider.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: showAdditionalIndicatorsCompass
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Show additional heading indicators on Compass

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: showSimpleCameraControl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Show controls for camera triggering using MAV_CMD_DO_DIGICAM_CONTROL.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: showObstacleDistanceOverlay
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Show obstacle distance overlay on map and video.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: maxGoToLocationDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Maximum distance allowed for Go To Location.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: forwardFlightGoToLocationLoiterRad
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Loiter radius for orbiting the Go To Location during forward flight. This only applies if the firmware supports a radius in MAV_CMD_DO_REPOSITION commands.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: goToLocationRequiresConfirmInGuided
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Require slide confirmation for Go To Location when the vehicle is already in Guided mode.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: updateHomePosition
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Send updated GCS' home position to autopilot in case of change of the home position

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: instrumentQmlFile2
QGC.MetaData.Facts.enumStrings: Integrated Compass & Attitude,Horizontal Compass & Attitude,Large Vertical

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: requestControlAllowTakeover
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: When requesting vehicle control, allow other GCS to override control automatically, or require this GCS to accept the request first.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: requestControlTimeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Timeout in seconds before a request to a GCS to allow takeover is assumed to be rejected. This is used to display the timeout graphically on requestor and GCS in control.
